MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Due to difficult digging conditions, we now expect supplies to be restored by midnight. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
